evolutionaryGoal.description: Evolve ConfidenceID into a living trust ecosystem with temporal dynamics, collective memory, decentralized verification, information-theoretic compression, and contextual adaptation, achieving >85% verification accuracy in diverse environments with >90% trust field stability and >95% user satisfaction.
constraints: Support temporal evolution of trust signals
Adapt seamlessly to different verification contexts

corePrinciples.name: Trust as a Dynamic Temporal Field
corePrinciples.description: Trust signals evolve, decay, amplify, and resonate across time, forming a dynamic field rather than static values.

corePrinciples.name: Verification Through Collective Memory
corePrinciples.description: A shared archaeological record of verification enables pattern recognition across time and context.

corePrinciples.name: Decentralized Trust Authority
corePrinciples.description: Verification authority is distributed across a network of nodes, establishing consensus through weighted agreement.

corePrinciples.name: Trust as Compressed Information
corePrinciples.description: Trust signals are information-dense compressions of verification history, context, and confidence.

corePrinciples.name: Embodied Trust in Context
corePrinciples.description: Trust interfaces adapt to different environments and integrate seamlessly with user experience.

corePrinciples.name: Symbolic Residue as Evolutionary Fuel
corePrinciples.description: Verification failures, anomalies, and edge cases drive continuous improvement and adaptation.

corePrinciples.name: Cross-Modal Semantic Resonance
corePrinciples.description: Coherence across modalities provides a strong signal for verification and authenticity.

corePrinciples.name: Adversarial Co-Evolution
corePrinciples.description: Attack and defense mechanisms evolve together, each driving the other to greater sophistication.

symbolicResidueCatalog.description: Trust decay rate varies significantly across content types.
symbolicResidueCatalog.analysis: Different verification signals have unique temporal properties.
symbolicResidueCatalog.impactAssessment: Requires content-specific temporal dynamics in trust field equations.

symbolicResidueCatalog.description: Sybil attacks on verification network detected.
symbolicResidueCatalog.analysis: Malicious nodes attempting to manipulate consensus.
symbolicResidueCatalog.impactAssessment: Drives development of robust reputation systems and attack resistance.

symbolicResidueCatalog.description: User confusion when trust signals adapt too rapidly.
symbolicResidueCatalog.analysis: Interface adaptation rate exceeds user mental model update rate.
symbolicResidueCatalog.impactAssessment: Need smoother transition functions in adaptive interfaces.

symbolicResidueCatalog.description: Trust compression losing critical context in high-entropy content.
symbolicResidueCatalog.analysis: Compression algorithm optimized for low-entropy cases.
symbolicResidueCatalog.impactAssessment: Develop adaptive compression based on content complexity.

symbolicResidueCatalog.description: Pattern recognition fails with limited verification history.
symbolicResidueCatalog.analysis: Archaeological patterns require minimum fossil record density.
symbolicResidueCatalog.impactAssessment: Implement bootstrapping with synthetic verification history.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Temporal Trust Field Development
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Develop mathematical models for trust as a temporal field with dynamics.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Trust Archaeology System
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Create collective memory and pattern recognition for verification history.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Decentralized Trust Protocol
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Develop consensus protocols for distributed verification authority.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Information-Theoretic Trust Compression
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Create algorithms for compressing verification history into dense trust signals.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Embodied Trust Interfaces
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Develop adaptive interfaces that integrate with user experience.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Recursive Trust Grammar Evolution
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Evolve semantic watermark grammar to encode rich, self-verifying metadata.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Proactive Residue Forecaster
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Develop systems to predict emerging attack vectors through residue pattern analysis.

evolutionaryBlueprints.name: Cross-Modal Coherence Engine
evolutionaryBlueprints.description: Develop analyzers for detecting semantic and temporal consistency across modalities.

reflectionArchive.content: Integrated temporal dynamics, collective memory, decentralized verification, information compression, and contextual adaptation into a cohesive trust ecosystem framework.
Predicted emergence of modality-specific trust decay rates, requiring adaptive field equations that account for content type and complexity.
Successfully demonstrated Sybil attack vectors against naive consensus protocols, highlighting need for robust reputation systems in the decentralized trust network.

currentEvolutionaryCycle.activeGoalSnapshot: Transform ConfidenceID into a living trust ecosystem with temporal dynamics, collective memory, decentralized verification, information compression, and contextual adaptation.

layers.summary: Synthesized five new evolutionary layers addressing key residues: temporal trust field, collective memory, decentralized verification, information compression, and embodied interfaces.

saveState.description: Evolved ConfidenceID fractal.json with trust ecosystem framework.
